entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 p.m. CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -17.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 6:00 PM EST Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -17.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -18.4°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Blizzard developing this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to periods of snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
